title: News and Events
sentences: News & Events Recent  INSPIRE Seminar Series - IMPROVING NATIONAL ECONOMY THROUGH COMMERCIALIZING RESEARCH OUTPUT June 10, 2021 With an intention to help our students identify the SCIENTIST in them, we, the Department of Chemistry, University of Peradeniya will commence a departmental seminar series named " INSPIRE" inviting renowned academics and researchers to share their knowledge, expertise, and experience with the students of the Department of Chemistry/Faculty of Science. The first half of this new seminar series will feature webinars/seminars from senior academic staff members and emeritus professors from the Department of Chemistry to recognize the valuable contributions they’ve made to our department, university, and the world of science. The rest of the seminar series will include webinars/seminars from invited speakers from all over the world from renowned academic and research institutions/industries, to explore their research and expertise with our students and staff. This will be a great opportunity for our students to get exposure and insight into world-class research culture. This will also allow our students to make connections with the academic/research leaders, which will surely benefit them when they apply for higher studies. Therefore, we kindly invite you all to participate in our seminar series, which will begin on the 17th of June 2021(details below). You are feel free to share the flyer attached herewith. title: CSUP Peradeniya - Game Night
sentences: Game Night Game Night 2K17 "We shall find peace. We shall hear the ang el s, we shall see the sky sparkling with diamonds." CSUP Game Night 2017 organized by the students of the Computer Society of the University of Peradeniya (CSUP) in collaboration with the Department of Statistics and Computer Science was held at the Science Faculty Common Room on the 7th of September 2017 at 6.30 p.m . onwards. The main aim of the event was to introduce CSUP to the new students of the Faculty of Science. 14 teams representing students and temporary academic staff members of the Faculty of Science took part in the event. The i nauguration ceremony was held with the participation of Prof. Saluka Kodituwakku (Dean, Faculty of Science), Dr. Amalka Pinidiyarachchi (Head, Department of Statistics and Computer Science), Dr. Shelton Perera, Dr. Ruwan Nawarathna (Senior Treasurer, CSUP), Mr. Prabhath Gunathilake and Past members of CSUP. The team, Hindagala Uppers (Amila Nakandala, Rupika Ekanayaka, Budhdima Amarathunga, Shakya Ranasinghe, and Asanka Weerasuriya) emerged as champions. Also, the team, DeMonsters ( Bhashithe Abeysinghe, Isuru Dharmasena, and Ahmed Shariff) and the team, Inhumans (Ramesh Kavinda, Nuwan Priyankara, Asela Chandrasekara, Harindu Ravihansa , and Janith Dasanayake) won the 1st and 2nd runner up places, respectively. CSUP Game Night 2017 concluded successfully with very positive feedback from the participants.
